price: 26. Dheh: Alle baa idin nooleyn, haddana idin dhinsiin, haddana idiin soo kulmin Maalinta Qiyaamaha aan shaki ku jirin, dadka badankiisuse ma oga.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يَجۡمَعُكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahu yuḥ'yīkum thumma yumītukum thumma yajmaʿukum ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati lā rayba fīhi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
